chapter.text: 91|1|soory tatha usakee dhoop kee shapath hai
91|2|aur chaand kee shapath, jab usake peechhe nikale
91|3|aur din kee shapath, jab use (arthaat soory ko) prakat kar de
91|4|aur raatri kee saugandh, jab use (soory ko) chhupa le
91|5|aur aakaash kee saugandh tatha usakee jisane use banaaya
91|6|tatha dharatee kee saugandh aur jisane use phailaaya
91|7|aur jeev kee saugandh, tatha usakee jisane use theek theek sudhaara.
91|8|phir use duraachaar tatha sadaachaar ka vivek diya hai.
91|9|vah saphal ho gaya, jisane apane jeev ka shudhdikaran kiya.
91|10|tatha vah kshati mein pad gaya, jisane use (paap mein) dhansa diya.
91|11|samood" jaati ne apane duraachaar ke kaaran (eeshadoot) ko jhuthalaaya.
91|12|jab unamen se ek hatbhaaga taiyaar hua.
91|13|(eeshadoot saaleh ne) unase kaha ki allaah kee oontanee aur usake peene kee baaree kee raksha karo.
91|14|kintu, unhonne nahin maana aur use vadh kar diya, jisake kaaran unake paalanahaar ne yaatana bhej dee aur unhen chauras kar diya.
91|15|aur vah usake parinaam se nahin darata.
